title: 【调查】你们都在用哪些菜单插件？
author: X836696023
txt_content:
本帖最后由 X836696023 于 2020-1-30 14:27 编辑 

你们都在用哪些菜单插件？是在用“上个时代”的CC菜单，还是在用最近“新兴”的TrMenu呢？
或者是又爱又恨的DeluxeMenu呢？

目前看来cc菜单占比真高。。。

replies.author: 云栀幻雪
replies.txt_content: 上世纪的和新兴的都有用，老服不想换了麻烦，新服的话还是尝试新的事物。

replies.author: Aikini
replies.txt_content: 一直用的CC 也不太想换了 再换感觉有点麻烦 而且感觉换了就枉费了我配置那么久

replies.author: 可可麦片丶
replies.txt_content: 用习惯了CC改不掉了--

replies.author: 末影人法师
replies.txt_content:
个人认为CC挺不错的2333
bossshop感觉用不习惯。。

replies.author: sunting
replies.txt_content: 我也用的cc菜单
CC吧，都用习惯啦！

replies.author: wangmcptr
replies.txt_content: 开始用cc后来改成bsp

replies.author: 悠然学院
replies.txt_content: vv啊，多漂亮，高端大气上档次

replies.author: 卫斯李
replies.txt_content: 之前用CC。现在用杜蕾斯+CC

replies.author: 阿痴先森丶
replies.txt_content: cc的衍生工具非常多，所以cc用的人也多了。

replies.author: tanzhihao
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 保守
replies.txt_content: CC菜单貌似有能刷菜单物品的BUG

replies.author: HorizonStudio
replies.txt_content: AdvancedMenu是我知道的那个AdvancedMenu吗...站里搬运的那个吗

replies.author: Lao_Ge
replies.txt_content: CC不好吗？其他都用不惯。

replies.author: vsvs
replies.txt_content: 没用过。。
有一说一，个人还是感觉bsp好用

replies.author: 皓月kanni
replies.txt_content: 当然是CC啦，懒得换了

replies.author: yuejiewudi1997
replies.txt_content: TDG，比较高大上

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 小孩子才做选择，我全都用！

replies.author: 龙猫酱~
replies.txt_content: deluxemenu不香吗

replies.author: 2622071942qqq
replies.txt_content: 个人推荐chestcommands插件好用，因为有编辑器嘛

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: VirtualChest

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
我还是比较喜欢DeluxeMenus
在功能多的情况下相对简单,而且是clip大佬写的
要不然我怎么会把DM的原贴和Wiki搬过来呢

replies.author: Soul_bite
replies.txt_content: 还是ChestCommands好用

replies.author: raa233
replies.txt_content:
习惯了呢
不想换（懒）

replies.author: Blank°
replies.txt_content: 我们还是都不太喜欢改变呢，都是用着CC这种老东西

replies.author: 快乐小方
replies.txt_content: 以前服务器用的cc，现在服务器不需要菜单了

replies.author: 秦洪涛
replies.txt_content: 当然是ChestCommands啦...方便有容易制作

replies.txt_content: CC配合BS  cc主菜单 bs做商城

replies.author: zsc588
replies.txt_content: 基本上都是用CC的= =

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 反正我基岩Java都用菜单

replies.author: yuanerf
replies.txt_content: 还是CC 最好用 boss感觉 不是很好用哎

replies.author: PercyDan

replies.txt_content: 讲道理 不咋用菜单 也就玩的懂第一个

replies.author: 骚马克
replies.txt_content: DM 天下第一

replies.author: jsk704.
replies.txt_content: 上世纪的和新兴的都有用，老服不想换了麻烦，

replies.author: hb03108
replies.txt_content: CC没咋接触..最近在用Boss PRO版感觉挺好用的

replies.author: Mywood
replies.txt_content: cc和bossshop都挺好用吧

replies.author: 浮生忆若梦
replies.txt_content: cc好用吧。。

replies.author: yahinstudio
replies.txt_content: sponge服用VirtualChest的路过

replies.author: xiaoandada
replies.txt_content: 目前好像就CC最火

replies.author: 倾宸
replies.txt_content: 自我感觉CC比较好用吧

replies.author: a87339531
replies.txt_content: CC都快百分之五十了，看来用的人是真的多

replies.author: 极武凌云
replies.txt_content: CC啊，这个无疑是坠吼的

replies.author: 深城i
replies.txt_content: cc他不香吗，cc个人觉得方便

replies.author: 小天铄
replies.txt_content: dm多好，现在cc，bs啥的都不用了，就用dm
好用才是硬道理   新旧无所谓

replies.author: qq568129016
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content: 第一次用就是用的bossshop，也没用过别的

replies.author: ghzz
replies.txt_content: 不用菜单插件，自己写

replies.author: 鲸鱼不是鱼
replies.txt_content: CC使用率最高唉

replies.author: 失心疯.
replies.txt_content: 主要是因为cc的编辑器好用点（虽然我是直接在yml编辑的），并且出的时间较早，BUG也比较少

replies.author: SufferingA
replies.txt_content: cc万岁！

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content: 某个全中文配置的菜单，虽然加载按钮的时候按钮名称会刷屏

replies.author: 5156143246a
replies.txt_content: CC.....这是什么东西啊

replies.author: GuuWoo
replies.txt_content: TRMENU功能挺多的 用惯了DM有点难入手

replies.author: dsjjyfsj123
replies.txt_content: 还是cc用着最顺手，自从第一次搜菜单插件接触到cc以后就没看过其它菜单插件了，新插件啥的也不想换，省的花时间适应新环境

replies.author: Mc_YaoYang
replies.txt_content: 看来用ChestCommands的还是挺多的

replies.author: 安阳先生
replies.txt_content: 常用的似乎是CC

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content: 那肯定是cc 小服只当菜单用其实也用不到多少高端功能

replies.author: 天选之剑
replies.txt_content: 一直用的CC 换感觉有点麻烦

replies.author: 希伊撒
replies.txt_content: CC还是比较简单的吧

replies.author: Da_Hao_ZI2333
replies.txt_content: 海绵端路过

replies.author: q13547900
replies.txt_content: 用cc把  有个小软件可以配置 很方便

replies.author: hp涛涛
replies.txt_content: CC好用程度不香吗？

replies.author: se、wang
replies.txt_content: taboomenu 用的这个了

CC吧 用的比较多

replies.txt_content:

那是因为你把一键整理模组装到了服务端里面导致的

replies.txt_content: 尝试下新鲜的的嘛

replies.txt_content: TabooMenu，1.12.2感觉用这个不错~

replies.txt_content: CC天下第一啊 还简单

replies.author: |yasdiox|
replies.txt_content: CC多香 一半都用这个

replies.author: 冷枫小乐
replies.txt_content: 永远用上个时代的cc，他不香嘛

replies.author: 国产盒子精
replies.txt_content: 挺喜欢杜蕾斯菜单插件的，奈何不会编辑，只能用cc过度下

replies.author: BlackMax
replies.txt_content: TrMenu，很不错的一款菜单插件，已经上手了

replies.author: 诗钰啊
replies.txt_content: 锤爆taboomenu吧，我用过的也就只有tm和cc，我最喜欢的菜单插件莫过于tm啦~

replies.author: PETT
replies.txt_content: 没有sponge 得VC???

replies.author: soil-sword
replies.txt_content: BossShop更为老牌和有效。

现在主要用菜单插件的检测功能
可以实现对比变量来执行命令

replies.author: TLCAB
replies.txt_content: ChestCommands还是非常好用的.

replies.author: 秦洪涛
replies.txt_content: cc菜单，现在大多服务器都是用这个

replies.author: shenlonge
replies.txt_content: cc菜单比较好吧

replies.author: z841309249
replies.txt_content: cc用习惯了!

replies.txt_content: cc  习惯了
